#region modules
from fp.flows.flow_manage import FlowManage
from fp.io.pkl import load_obj
#endregion

#region variables
#endregion

#region functions
def main():
    flowmanage: FlowManage = load_obj('flowmanage.pkl')
    flowmanage.remove(
        job_all=True, 
        interactive=True, 
        fmt_files=True
    )
#endregion

#region classes
#endregion

#region main
if __name__=='__main__':
    main()
#endregion
